text: @realDonaldTrump Dear @POTUS, Has anyone shown you the death numbers as they pertain to the flu, heart attacks, old age, cancer, etc. I have heard from your 2 'experts' that these deaths r being coded as covid19. If true the real virus deaths CDC reports are LIES. Stop this shut down now, please.
